column4: I have a dual boot setup on my laptop, gutsy and XP.  I want my xp hdd (ntfs) to automatically be mounted every time I log in to ubuntu.  How can I get that done?
you can write it in ur /etc/fstab
in the /etc/fstab are the devices which are automaticly mounted on startup
the syntax is like this "/dev/sda7       /media/Windows               ntfs-3g    defaults,users 0 0"
to find the right values try "cat /etc/mtab"
in the mtab are the currently mounted devices
